Docs.summary: Helper class for creating a Message object from streaming content.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message CreateMessage (System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion version, string action, System.IO.Stream stream);

.method public static hidebysig class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message CreateMessage(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion version, string action, class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateMessage (version As MessageVersion, action As String, stream As Stream) As Message
static member CreateMessage : System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion * string * System.IO.Stream -> System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message

Docs.param: Specifies the addressing and envelope versions to use for the newly created message. If the request is made using REST, the Addressing and Envelope version are None.
A description of how the message should be processed. For messages sent in response to a HTTP request, this value must be “GETRESPONSE”.
A stream that contains content used to write the body of the new message.
Docs.summary: Creates a message, using the specified version, action, and stream.

Public Shared Function GetStream (message As Message) As Stream

Docs.summary: Retrieves the stream of the specified message.
Docs.returns: Returns a that contains the stream of the message. A Stream is always returned regardless of whether the message body is empty.
